mapper.select: SELECT * FROM QA ORDER BY QA_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QA (user_id, qa_no, qa_content, user_name, qa_image, qa_state, title) VALUES (#{userId}, SEQ_QA.NEXTVAL, #{qaContent}, #{userName}, #{qaImage}, #{qaState}, #{title})
mapper.update: UPDATE QA SET title = #{title}, qa_content =#{qaContent}, qa_image = NVL(#{qaImage}, qa_image) WHERE qa_no =#{qaNo}
